description: This table extracts evidence-related information (such as vitals, medication, results) tied to a query.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EVIDENCE_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the evidence.

columns.name: EVIDENCE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of evidence used to create a query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Problem


Medication


Result


Vital

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
